name: Update GitHub Stats

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 0 * * 0'  # Runs every Sunday at 00:00 UTC
  workflow_dispatch:      # Allows manual trigger from GitHub UI

jobs:
  update-stats:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3    # Checks out your repo

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.x'      # Use latest Python 3

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install matplotlib requests   # Needed for your script

      - name: Run GitHub Stats Script
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}  # Provides access to your repo
        run: python github_stats.py

      - name: Commit and Push Changes
        run: |
          git config --local user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
          git config --local user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git add assets/github_language_pie.png assets/github_commits_bar.png assets/github_stars_bar.png assets/github_summary.md
          git commit -m "Update GitHub stats charts" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push
